page.title: 08OLD PEOPLE'S FLATS, HARROW.
page.content:
In{Hatch End,}there are some new retirement flats for people over 60 years old. They have all the facilities for the needs of someone old who cannot move or walk very far. If the people fall over, they have a special{alarm cord}to pull. This alarm goes to the{wardens' flats}and the {office.}The warden can speak to them through the{speaker}which goes to their room. The Acorn Flats are better for a single person because the flats are very small but the Briar and Chestnut Flats would be for a couple because they are bigger. The{residents' lounge}is for the people to come and chat to each other.
The flats are near to the shops, station and bus stops.
